text: Shingari Bolona is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sathish Mannarkad, starring Nishanth Sagar and Manya in the lead roles. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/sinkari-bolona.html ==Cast== * Nishanth Sagar * Manya * Lal * Beena * Kalabhavan Mani * Jagathy Sreekumar * Ravi Menon * V.
